spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Trenzia is a 5th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). She requires no somatic or material components to cast its spells. Trenzia has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.
